metadata.title: CVE-2024-6542 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper neutralization of livestatus command delimiters in mknotifyd inCheckmk <= 2.0.0p39, < 2.1.0p47, < 2.2.0p32 and < 2.3.0p11 allows arbitrarylivestatus command execution.Improper neutralization of livestatus commanddelimiters in mknotifyd in Checkmk <= 2.0.0p39, < 2.1.0p47, < 2.2.0p32and < 2.3.0p11 allows arbitrary livestatus command execution.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
